Features.EasyPanning.SpeedMultiplier.Des: Change the speed at which the player pans resources. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 2.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.EasyPanning.SaturationMultiplie: Change the rate at which saturation is drained, while panning. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 2.0, Default: 1.0.
